Author: TRUONG THANH JAPAN
Title: [ANN] [CrowdSale] SEN Token:To unify scattered loyalty programs in Vietnam
Body: Introducing new loyalty platform in Vietnam called "SEN Point" to unify scattered loyalty programs.   Problem form Consumer side  Too many Point cards from various stores on and offline. Unable to efficiently use the point they hold. There is no option of choosing rewards.   Problem form Retailer side.  Unable to track consumer`s information. Unable to utilize the Data gathered from the Loyalty program. Unable to interact with customer just by paper based point card.   Solution  Step 1: We have a strong sales team in Vietnam to establish the new loyalty program call "SEN Point". Step 2: Launch the Mobile platform by creating App for consumers and System for Retailers. Step 3: Retailers can purchase marketing data in SEN Point Platform using SEN Token to maximize their profit.  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ABOUT SEN Token  SEN Token is a payment method used by affiliate stores to purchase marketing data, premium ad space, and other services that have been accumulated by the SEN Point Platform for exposure and customer attention.    ABOUT SEN POINT  SEN POINT is the name of the ecosystem for the universal customer loyalty program. It is also the unit of measurement for the number of rewards the retailer shall distribute and the consumer shall receive per purchase transaction.    ROADMAP  Here is our future plan, from which you can expect when SEN TOKEN can be used effectively on our platform. Please note that our primary goal is to develop and expand SEN POINT platform steadily. As such, any indications of target release dates listed are subject to change.    Launched APP  We have already launched related useful APPs for Android and developing for iPhone now.    SEN POINT   SEN POINT for Shop   TTJ Wallet   Features  A ranking system motivates consumers to accumulate and save SEN Points A lottery is held at given times to incentivize point usage   Crowdsale  Users will be able to purchase SEN Token from its official site (https://crowdsale.sencoin.com/) using various cryptocurrencies. The number of available tokens will be 4,950,000,000 (30% of total circulation) and will be available through 30 days. Early adopters will be able to benefit from a discount. - 1st 15days: 1 SEN Token = $0.04 - 2nd 15days: 2 SEN Token = $0.05 Method of payments allowed will be BTC and XLM.   Team  TTJ is a startup that is backed by a Vietnamese company, TTVN group. TTVN has a track record in various sectors including renewable energy, urban infrastructure, real estate, and finance investment, and they specialize in energy and high tech industries. In order increase their presence in leverage in the ever-growing IT sector, TTJ was founded. The aim and mission of TTJ is to employ innovative technology to maximize their contribution to the communities and Vietnam as a whole.
